page.title: 15STERLING METALS FACTORY
page.content: Sterling Metals employs about 1400 people.There are 4 foundaries in total. About 1,500 castings are made in the iron foundary. The heaviest casting is the Morfax Plate weighing about 5 tons and costing about Â£7,500. Although fatal injuries are very low(the last was in 1981), minor injuries,such as eye injuries, give cause for concern. The men are given safety glasses, but many still do not wear them. The biggest disaster was in 1978 when there was an explosion. Damage was done to nearby houses but no one was injured. The last major strike involving the whole company was in 1979. In 1983, there was a strike involving one department. They have their own works doctor,ambulance and fire brigade,specially trained for fires involving metal. There is a work's club and many sporting clubs.
